title: Gaussian Generating functionals on easy quantum groups
authors: Uwe Franz, Amaury Freslon, Adam Skalski
abstract:
We describe all Gaussian generating functionals on several easy quantum
groups given by non-crossing partitions. This includes in particular the free
unitary, orthogonal and symplectic quantum groups. We further characterize
central Gaussian generating functionals and describe a centralization procedure
yielding interesting (non-Gaussian) generating functionals.
